entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
